abstract: DealBook Online; Computer chip maker Microsemi will acquire PMC-Sierra for $2.5 billion in cash and stocks.
lead_paragraph: The deal is the latest in the semiconductor industry as chip makers scale up for customers that want to cut down on the number of suppliers.

headline.main: Microsemi Wins PMC-Sierra With a $2.5 Billion Bid

snippet: The deal is the latest in the semiconductor industry as chip makers scale up for customers that want to cut down on the number of suppliers.
